
parchords_jupyter
=====================================

Version: |release|

jupyter widget with parallel coords that enables interactive sonification


Quickstart
----------

To get started with parchords_jupyter, install with pip::

    pip install parchords_jupyter

or with conda::

    conda install parchords_jupyter
